SelectPkDml: select cu.column_name as columnname, c.data_type as datatype from information_schema.key_column_usage cu join information_schema.columns c on cu.table_schema = c.table_schema and cu.table_name = c.table_name and cu.column_name = c.column_name where cu.table_schema = 'ex8_db1' and constraint_name = 'primary' and cu.TABLE_NAME = 'ATeam';
